title: Error when i launch lol alpha client
body: Pls someone help me with this error http://imgur.com/a/8rhCr

replies.body: This white screen error could be indicating a connection issue with your network, failing to reach our services and grab assets.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Hopefully that does the trick!
